comments:
Description: Error message appears when preview an image.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add an URI image.
2. Set its url address "http://hp.msn.com/2I/_XM9~_`9ZW5I]T9{Q29,@+.jpg".
3. Click on "preview" tab. Error message appears. But image can still display.

There are errors on the report page: 
-There are error(s) in Image : 4 
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

In the ui for editing an image item, if you enter the URI as
http://hp.msn.com/2I/_XM9~_`9ZW5I]T9{Q29,@+.jpg you will get javascript errors, but if you enter it as "http://hp.msn.com/2I/_XM9~_`9ZW5I]T9{Q29,@+.jpg" there are no errors. This is because the URI is handled as an expression. See ImageItemExecutor.handleURIImage

This is not my area, so I'm reassigning.
The user doesn't quote the expression.
